page.title: Bishop Chester on the obs. of Good Friday

revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: An earnest exhortation to the religious observance of Good-Friday : In a letter to the inhabitants of Lambeth parish. By Beilby Porteus, D.D. Rector of the said Pari..."
revision.text: Possibly: An earnest exhortation to the religious observance of Good-Friday : In a letter to the inhabitants of Lambeth parish. By Beilby Porteus, D.D. Rector of the said Parish. Now Lord Bishop of Chester. (London : Printed ; And sold by J. and F. Rivington, in St. Paul's Church-Yard ; T. Payne, at the Mews Gate ; J. Dodsley, in Pall-Mall ; B. White, in Fleet-Street ; T. Cadell, in the Strand ; and J. Robson, New Bond-Street, M. DCC. LXXVII. [1777]). http://www.worldcat.org/oclc/723448892
